Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I started to play this awesome game two weeks ago and really enjoy it! I already sent kerbals to mÃƒÂ¼n and minimus, made an station orbiting kerbin and docked with an rescue capsul and a flood light system there.

I'm really looking forward to the R&D Patch, since I want to make some long range unmaned landers and satelites for other planets Until then I'm working on highspeed Jets which can land everywhere to get the Sience on Kerbal going!

Here's the Crew of my Station (called "Ponyhof") outside to get some tan:

Hope to see a lot more of this game!

Happy Flying everyone
Hey there leberscnhitzel and welcome to the forums! One of those Kerbals doesn't seem to be all too pleased though
He's just amazed by the beauty of the sun burning out his eyes
